caption.p: Antimicrobial activity of the N. sativa thionins (NsW1, NsW2 and NsW4) detected by disc-diffusion method: A. fumigatus 2K ( A) and A. flavus 3K ( B); Amphotericin B was used as positive control. Inhibition caused by NsW2: A. fumigatus 163m ( C), Cryptococcus laurentii 801M ( D) and Candida krusei 1447N ( E); Nystatin and Fluconazole were used as positive control (not shown on photo).
